response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a reasonable return for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 10000}
